The export and import of playlists is in beta due to the fact that only the music identifiers are recorded.\nIf the music is deleted and then re-added on the device or if you change the device, the music will have a new identifier and therefore there will be bad music in the playlists.\nThis issue will be fixed in a future update.

To activate Android Auto you must carry out the following steps:

1) Go to Android Auto settings.

2) Multiple click on "Version" to activate dev mode.

3) Go to Dev's settings and activate "Unknown sources" as this app is not published on Google Play Store.

4) Click on the 3 buttons as in point 3, but click on "Exit developer mode" the setting you just activated will be saved.

5) Add app in launcher.

6) Enjoy

This parameter allows you to send audio treatment to a dedicated process.
This reduces energy consumption.

However, in the Media 3 library used in Satunes, this can cause compatibility issues which results in audio cuts. A known issue is that the music is stopping during playback or after the end of a song.

By activating this parameter, you reduce energy consumption and increase the battery life but you are likely to meet audio cuts.

I hope that in a nearby future, the problem will be resolved by Google which holds the Media3 and Exoplayer libraries. In the meantime, I try to find viable solutions to reduce energy consumption by Satunes.

Yay! You have just installed a new version of Satunes.

I hope this version is better than the older one.

If you ever notice any problems or want to make suggestions, you can send me an email at: pirlot.antoine@outlook.com.

Thank you for your help! üòä

I wish you good listening üéßüéµ

You can export logs to send me them by email.

With these logs I can understand more about what's wrong with the app.

Logs files contain informations about what the app does and its state.
These informations includes:
- Dates
- Process
- App state

In these logs, there's not confidential informations as music informations or data that can identify you.

If you're not convinced, you can choose to describe me the problem but it will be more difficult to fix issues.
